BOLT_PCD is the bolt-circle RADIUS (7.5 mm). The equivalent bolt-circle DIAMETER is 15.0 mm.
Bolt holes are patterned 4x over 360° with equal spacing; keep D3@CirPattern1 = 360deg constant (no variable needed).
